page.title: 03Spitewinter radio mast
page.content: This mast is made from 2.75"{steel {tube,}and is{100ft high,}with guy lines every 10 ft. It is situated 1042 ft above sea level, and is a'line of sight mast', that is to say, radio waves travel in straight lines with no obstruction e.g. hills, so with its height, this mast{can reach Lincolnshire}and has an aproximate{thirty to forty miles {radius. It is used mainly for{commercial {purposes}of air call, (base to vehicle) Warden service, Plant hire service, and Van and Lorry Business.
